title: The Redhorn Gate / Road to Rivendell Arwen Undomiel + Elrond's Counsel

comments.content: Can I use Elrond's Counsel in this case ?…She's a Noldor and the first player takes control of her…
Sure, this will work as long as you are the first player (as the first player passively gains control of Arwen). Under those circumstances, you will indeed control a unique Noldor character.
